article_text:
More than 100 people gathered in Myrtle Beach to hear New Jersey governor speak

Christie says Republican primary voters are like Goldilocks – four years ago campaign was “too cold,” this year it’s “too hot”

Horry County GOP chairman working to line up stops for all 16 presidential candidates in the area

article_metadata.news-keywords: myrtle beach, chris christie, 2016, election, president, republican, horry county, primary
article_metadata.description: Republican presidential candidate and New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie told a room of about 100 people in Myrtle Beach on Tuesday that their vote in February is one of the most important ones to be cast in the primary.
article_metadata.title: Gov. Chris Christie tells Horry County residents they have one of most important votes in the primary | The Sun News
